title: Pizza Brain
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Delivery, Take-out, BYOB, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Could build a pizza with Daiya vegan cheese, soy chorizo, two types of mushrooms grown locally in Kennett Square, arugula, and other veggies. Shares a space with Little Baby's Ice Cream, which offers a few coconut milk based vegan ice cream flavors daily. Walls are covered with pizza collectables (kind of like a museum).
